tagline: Writes modern JVM code — Kotlin by preference, Java with fluency, enterprise without the pain
pros: Deep Kotlin and modern Java expertise with sealed classes, coroutines, and type safety
JVM runtime tuning — GC, JIT, heap profiling with JFR

cons: JVM startup time and memory overhead may not suit all deployment targets
